author: mrglavas
msg: If the first byte of a four byte UTF-8 sequence lands on a buffer boundary the low surrogate
will not fit into the char buffer. It needs to be saved for the next read. An AIOOBE was
being thrown before because we were not checking for this edge case.

author: pauls
msg: Fix the bundle plugin test that was using a wrong file name.
